Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of short vertical strokes at rim; dot and billet pattern below, above part of large maeander and trace of vertical dividing band; graffito inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 252, no. 395)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0113) (phase 2)
